citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
During inspection, facility representative was unable to locate the facility records. These records are
required to be kept for examination by APHIS officials during business hours for the necessary enforcement of
regulations.
To be corrected by October 23, 2015
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative
